Package com.b2international.snowowl.authentication.ldap

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LdapAuthenticationBootstrap
    Bootstrap fragment implementation for LDAP based authentication module.
    LdapAuthenticationPlugin  
    LdapLoginModule
    JAAS login module, which uses an LDAP directory for authenticating users and determining their roles.
    LdapUserManager
    Utility class to handle user information stored in an LDAP directory.
